anonymizeInfo.message: Anonymize visited addresses when recording them, preventing anyone from viewing them in this extension

backupInfo.message: Create or restore a full backup of recorded visits

createBackupDesc.message: Set a password to protect the backup

downloadBadgeInfo.message: Show a badge when a download link has already been accessed

exportAllNote.message: All records will be available when exporting data

exportBackupHint.message: To keep access dates, the download comparator, and encrypted addresses, create a backup from the settings menu

exportChoiceText.message: Choose how you want to export the addresses:

exportInfo.message: Export all saved addresses that are not anonymized to a file

exportSelectAtLeastOne.message: Select at least one type to export

extensionDescription.message: Tracks visited pages and indicates when a link has already been visited

importInfo.message: Import addresses from a text file (.txt) with one URL per line

importInvalid.message: Invalid URLs were found. Do you want to include only the valid ones or cancel?

importInvalidWithCount.message: $1 invalid URLs were found. Do you want to include only the valid ones or cancel the import?

matchExceptionsInfo.message: Each line represents a domain to ignore for full matches

noValidUrls.message: No valid URLs found in the file.

partialExceptionsInfo.message: Each line represents a domain to ignore during partial matches

passwordMinimumLength.message: Password must be at least $1 characters long

restoreBackupDesc.message: Continuing will delete current visit data. Enter the password used for the backup.

welcomeSubtitle1.message: Adjust the settings below if you like.

welcomeSubtitle2.message: Some features start disabled but may be useful depending on your usage.

welcomeSubtitle3.message: You can change them later in this extension's menu settings.

welcomeSubtitle4.message: It is recommended to pin this extension in the browser so it is always visible because the icon indicates visited pages.
